And this collection, curated from the thousands he’s told on stage, is the best of the best. Many of them you will have heard in one version or another. Here, they are retold almost as transcripts of a live performance, complete with all the weird and wonderful diversions and exclamations he’s famous for. And, amazingly, the essence of Billy Connolly is so well contained in these pages, that you cannot help but hear his voice in your head as you read. No matter whether you’re Scottish or not, this is a book that demands to be read in a broad Glaswegian accent. Billy’s genius is that he views life through an unfiltered lens. He talks about what he sees and asks the questions that nobody else would dare. He speaks with unabashed candor about anything and everything. No subject is taboo, his observations on people and life shrewd and relentlessly funny. I’m so happy to have all these wonderful anecdotes collated and saved for posterity. This is a book I will return to time and again whenever I need a pick-me-up. And it’s one I’d highly recommend to each and every Big Yin fan.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: As I read I could hear Billy's voice in my head which was great. Sometimes though the jokes that were great in his shows were a little flat in the reading. That's actually a complement to Billy though. It shows that is not just the joke that's important but also the person telling it. I've re-told a few of my favourites of his jokes over the years and, while they are still funny, they're not a patch on the Big Yin's version.Finally, he ends the book with some very poignant words about growing old. Words I'll try to learn from and live by.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: As already mentioned, an nteresting good bloke who is great to listen to. But this book did not do a lot for me.Many of these tall tales and wee stories are thin but I can actually remember him telling and laughing at them out loud. He is a great performer and ad libs and creates fantastic scenes to draw us in. Some I have heard a dozen times but on paper they lose vibrancy and spontaneity.I would add that his explanation of Parkinson's is extremely helpful as it strips away the humbug and tells you what it feels like

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: This very funny man gives us exactly what the title promises: Tall Tales and Wee Stories. While he shares stories from his life and his insights on humanity along the way, this book is more like the Best of Billy. It's a written version of his stand up shows... rants, characters, and mid-story sidetracks included. It's funny, furious and foul-mouthed. His voice (and accent) jumps off the page. I thoroughly recommend it if you're looking for a laugh.Also good for dipping in and out if your time or attention span for reading is limited.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Not going to lie, shed a tear at the end.Billy Connolly is one of my all time favourite comedians. I've been watching him since I was little and this book is a well rounded experience for anything Connolly does.At its heart, its a best of book but there's nothing wrong with that. Billy imparts his wisdom (and it is wisdom) through his life experiences and anecdotes, there's also some fresh stories, especially towards the end...Well worth a read, had me in stitches throughout.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I like Billy Connolly. I think he's probably the best stand up comedian of my life time but I never got to see him in the flesh and now he's retired so I never will.This book is, as it implies, a collection of the stories Billy wove on stage over the years. Many will be new to you others will be familiar with but you will enjoy them again anyway. You will 'hear' these stories in Billy's voice (if you try a little) and you will laugh. Job done.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: The man is a legend. I think if you didn’t have any familiarity with him this book would go over your head completely. But then if you had no idea about him you probably wouldn’t pick it up in the first place! Many laughs and giggles as I pictured footage of Billy going telling these tales on stage. Not all the stories translated well in written form but many more of them did. I am now off to borrow as many Billy Connolly DVD’s from my public library as I can.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Loved this book! You can’t help but read this in a Glaswegian accent, Billy’s ‘voice’ and vitality spring from the page. I found myself reading bits aloud to my husband and both of us were giggling away. This is not a biography, it is basically a transcript of Billy’s gigs - I’ve googled a few on YouTube since and you can actually hear him telling the same gags! But it’s great and funny and almost lyrical in its enjoyment of language.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: A very good and very funny book. Most people who have seen Billy over the years will already have heard most of the material in this book, but its great to see them all in one place. Its great that even though there are no 'images and videos' that are usually associated with a lot of the material its still very , very funny. He pulls no punches, so if you don't like swearing or any mention of sexuality then don't read this. You have been warned LOL

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I like Billy Connolly. I like his brand of humour and his delivery but this book finally for me was an overload. Too many of the same sorts of tales feels almost too repetitive. I had some good wee laughs as I read but it became more of a struggle as I got on. Just too much. It felt a bit like, you had to be there to get the real feel of the humour. Dip into it, read bits but gorging on the whole thing felt bad for my health.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Years ago I had the "Best of Billy..." compilation that was lodged permanently in my DVD player to be played to no end. Whilst I've enjoyed reading his books chronicling adventures across continents & across the seas, sadly this is merely a transcription of said DVD with a few other stories thrown in, and I mean verbatim! There's not too much to be felt here, to newer followers maybe a few laughs, but a series of tall yarns told in no particular order has left me somewhat underwhelmed.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: He's one of Glasgow's greats but, having been born a little too late for the peak Billy Connolly years, I've always struggled to quite get the hype. Now, I know just how cardinal that sin was. In ways, this is the perfect introduction to the living legend and found myself bursting out laughing at so many of his wee tales/stand-up routines. A must read for anyone who loves the Big Yin or, like me, wants to see just what they've been missing.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Absolutely fantastic! Apart from the intro and end the whole thing is more like a transcript of the Big Yin's stage stories than a regular narrative. It's almost as though someone grabbed the subtitles from the tv and added a bit of punctuation. That might put some people off... the style is very unique. But you probably won't be reading this if you aren't already a fan of Billy Connolly and if you are, you're going to love it. I laughed out loud numerous times. Fantastic little book.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Billy Connolly's stand up routines were a large part of my upbringing because my dad could perform them so well. Long before I ever saw him on TV, I'd been hearing his words through my dad, who resembles him a bit. Not all of his humor has aged well, sadly, especially when it comes to women. Still, it's Billy and he maintains an endearing undertone throughout. Was lovely to revisit some of the stories I already knew verbatim and to read some new-to-me gems.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I love Billy Connolly and have seen several of his live shows. He is a consummate storyteller with a sharp eye for observation and has a delivery all of his own. I was really looking forward to this book as he retired two or three years ago but was disappointed. I don't know whether it is because I have heard many of these tales before, but they fell flat without Billy's exuberant performance. The most I managed was the odd chuckle. I wish I hadn't bothered, to be honest.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I really wanted to love this, but this book just misses Connolly’s incredible delivery that makes his such a loveable comedian. There are some great stories scattered throughout this book (“easy listening... how can something passive not be easy?!”) but this is by no means a biography of his life. Still, anyone from Glasgow will appreciate the humour and wit offered here in his life after stand up.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: If you have never had the honour of watching Billy Connolly live, this book is basically all the best bits of stage performances over the years. It is nowhere near as funny as watching him live or on a screen, but I felt a great sense of sadness that Billy is deteriorating before our eyes as I read this late at night, and I'm not sure that is good for pre-sleep psyche?His comic genius and talent is diluted on the page, so watch the clips.Ian M Pindar

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Big Yin, Huge LaughsI love Billy, always have so maybe a bit biased but who cares? He says at the start as you read you'll hear his voice and its true. Full of fantabulous tales, some told many times, some that were new but all told with his amazing sense of mischief. Buy this book, read it in 3 days like me or take your time. One thing is fsure, if you are having a bad day this book will cheer up even the most miserable!! Enjoy

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Great to relive some of the oldies and to read some new funnies. The conclusion left me with a stupid feel good grin. I'm happy I got to see the Big Yin live, it's very hard not to laugh out loud with this book, so reading it while your partner sleeps next to you may or may not be a good idea, you only live once, make it funny.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Some of this was laugh out loud funny. It annoyed Bernie as I read in bed. Other parts were some of his old well known stories and as you knew the punchline they did not work as well. And then some left me a little uncomfortable. His lack of political correctness was great however some of it to my mind does cross a line.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Thanks to Billy for the laughs in these trying times. Especially liked the tall tale of his schooldays and how he went to a Catholic school called 'Our Lady of Perpetual Pre-Menstrual Tension', and how it was f*****g hard going! Billy's voice was in my head as I read these stories, some of which I'd heard on TV. Keep it up, Billy!

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: The only reason I didn’t give this book a better rating is because I’ve been a massive Billy Connolly fan my whole life and I already knew about 80% of the jokes that were published in here. If you’re slightly less of a fan, or even if you’re in my shoes, this will give you a right good laugh. And let’s face it, that’s what we all need right now

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: 2 stars because there were a few funny lines in it. Sadly, it is just a load of his stuff from his stand up over the years in book form. On the page they are not as funny as when he performs them. I remembered a number of the routines and it was rather demoralising to realise that the stuff was that old!

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Bought at a charity sale in mint condition. Would never normally have purchased it. Very disappointing. Most of the tales I had heard before and many do not transfer well onto the page. Raised the occasional smile but no laughs. I feel this was just a money spinner, anyone wanting to enjoy Billy’s humour should stick to DVDs.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Billy Connelly and I do not seem to share a sense of humour. There was the odd anecdote I found amusing, but most were tedious. A few just sounded like a bitter old man having a rant. His attitude to women in some of the sections is appalling.However, if you’re a fan, this is probably a hugely entertaining book.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: What a a manGreat little read. Some parts of this book had me absolutely howling with laughter. The sort of things that make you want to tell someone straight away. My wife had to deal with those bits most of the time. Gutted I didn't get to watch this guy live in his prime. Thanks Billy.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: What a laugh. What a laugh I had reading this book most of which was read in my garden, and now the neighbours probably think that I am madder than I was before. As I spent hours out there laughing uncontrollably and wiping the tears from my eyes. What a fab time i had. I shall miss having you in my garden with me Billy. Loads of love to you. X

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Aside from a few little insightful bits and pieces, the book is literally just a transcription of Connolly's performances. Sadly text doesn't even go close to doing his talent justice - so much of Connolly's performing is based around slapstick, gesticulation and onomatopoeia that it translates poorly to text.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: A really funny, honest and frank collection of Billy Connelly's memories from his time playing in a folk group to starring in Hollywood blockbusters. Throughout the book, you can imagine him talking to you as if he is retelling the tales to you personally- the way is written is just how he talks! Incredibly gifted & funny chap.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Prescribe this on the NHS. Even without the actions and the movement from live performance, on the page you can imagine Billy - the folkie turned comic - spitting out every venomous anti-Beige sentiment. Lots of silliness (he'll be in Monty Python's class when the Great Book of British Comedy is written) and plenty of memoir.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Billy Connolly is a legend. This book certainly made me laugh just when I needed it! If your a fan of Billy you’ve probably heard most of these stories through out his career, like me. I think his previous books would be best for anyone who doesn’t want to re-read those. However I loved this. What a man 💕

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Brilliant. I haven’t laughed reading a book this much since ‘The night shift before Christmas’. Story after story in quick succession like his stand-up, including some of his well known tales from stand up. It ends with an honest reflection about his illnesses and dying, while still making you laugh. Definitely recommend.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I read this book and although I knew a lot of the wee stories already it still made me laugh.I had the pleasure of seeing him live a couple of years ago which was an absolute privilege he entertained us all for two hours straight through.The book itself I think is really a final goodbye from him an end to a brilliant career and I thoroughly enjoyed it.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: The Tall Tales and Wee Stories is a compendium of some of Billy's best loved stand-up routines. You can hear his voice in every word on every page, however this may lead you to find the recordings of many of the pieces and listen to or watch the 'Big Yin' deliver them in his own unique fashion as the book doesn't quite capture the electricity or chaotic nature of the live performance.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Brilliant man!I couldn't stop reading, or laughing! many of the stories I'd heard before from watching the Big Yin's shows so I could hear his familiar friendly voice in my head. A lovely read by a lovely man. Sad to finish, I'll definitely read again. Bless you, Billy, you're a star.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I've loved Billy Connolly's comedy from a young age, and delighted his stories are now written down. There were a good few I hadn't heard before.This book is definitely better enjoyed when you read it in Billy's voice - it just doesnt "sound" right in anyone else's. I really hope it gets made into an audiobook, it would be absolute gold.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Oh my goodness- such a laugh out loud type of book. Every word on every page is Billy. You can hear him as you read. Some of the stories you may have already heard, but that doesn’t matter because they are still as funny as f**k. (I couldn’t write a review of Billy’s book without using the f word could I?). A wonderful snapshot of Billy’s humour- fan-f**king-tastic!

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: This was a joy to read. I have seen Billy Connolly numerous times in concert, including his days with the Humblebums, and these anecdotes are just as funny written down as when performed on stage. He is without doubt the funniest storyteller of his generation and I would recommend this book to anyone who requires a hilarious diversion from the norm of everyday life.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Yes a seasoned Billy fan will have heard some of these "wee stories" before but it's great to revisit them especially given that the Big Yin will not be performing again. Given the joy he has brought to the world, it's been a pleasure and a privilege to view his anecdotes on the printed page. Lots of laugh out loud moments. Thanks for the memories and please keep on keeping on.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Well what could I say about Billy Connolly's Tall Tales and Wee Stories except that it's like pulling up a chair next to him and becoming enthralled with his words. Loved every minute of it. He's a wonderful man, not just hilarious but also refreshingly irreverent and inspirational in his unwavering "don't give a f*ck" attitude.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: This is brilliant though I just finished listening to it, I didn’t read the book. I’ve been a big fan of all of Billy’s work and this has got all the less well known routines as well as the famous ones and is a great listen. Made me roll round with laughter. Not sure I’d enjoy so much in reading them.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: This book made me chuckle and cringe sometimes, but sadly it can't capture Connolly's physical presence or energy on stage. Some of the magic is lost in translation here. Still, it's a fun read and broken up into short stories so it's perfect for reading on the go when you don't have a lot of time and need a quick fix.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: It’s a collection of routines and stories, many of which you’ll have heard before, if you’re a fan.Undoubtedly a mixed fare, but some wonderful, memorable ones for sure.But, and it is a bit, the magic is in the delivery, they way that the patter flows. Written down they’re not as magical.Still, there are words of wisdom, humour and joy in here.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I have loved Billy Connolly’s humour since I was younger. He genuinely makes me laugh out loud. I loved this book. It’s split into little stories so it’s very easy to read. I was familiar with some of them through watching his shows but some of them were new to me.It’s such a great read, very funny and entertaining. A must read for any fans of Billy Connolly and Scottish humour.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I have abandoned reading this. I love Billy Connolly and he may well be my favourite comedian, but the material is very familiar from his shows and I didn't feel like I was getting anything additional from this. I preferred watching him perform with all of the energy that goes with it. The stories are interesting, but from what I've read so far I already know them.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Did not finish.Having read just over half this book and only laughed a handful of times, I've decided to call a halt. Unfortunately Billy's unique on stage story telling and humour just doesn't transfer to the written word. In my opinion anyway. I tried reading it with my best Billy Connolly accent in mind, sadly to no avail.As Billy says many times in his book :"Aaaaaaaaggggggghhhhhhhh"!!

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: If you’ve ever had the pleasure of seeing Billy Connelly live you’ll enjoy this book. It’s written exactly like his stand up: a lot of rambling nonsense with some proper laugh out loud moments thrown in. I love the way he does it because the punchline sneaks up on you unexpectedly. I read the whole book in his voice in my head.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Absolutely brilliant! I haven’t laughed this hard for ages. If you’re a Big Yin fan and can bring his cadence and style to the forefront of your mind while reading this, you’ll cry laughing throughout.What a wonderful read, I’d recommend it to any fan even if they will have heard some of the jokes before. The world will certainly miss Billy Connolly.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Superb!! A proper trip down memory lane for me .... I’ve seen every Billy Connolly tape, video, DVD etc so reading these stories brought them all back. It’s impossible to read this without doing a Scottish accent in your own head but that just adds to the fun. Billy Connolly ... a good laugh! Thank you for the memories and for entertaining me so much over the years! I love you.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: "Always look to laugh. Nothing else will ever keep you going like laughter."A collection of witty, short stories and jokes from the loveable Scottish comedian. A reasonably funny read, though I imagine an audio book would capture the humor better and a bit of a struggle to follow the Scottish dialect in written form!

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: As a laid back choice of book to entertain myself casually over two days, it really hit the spot, so if you’re a quick reader, expect to finish this very quickly. It’s everything you’d expect from a Billy Connelly book; swearing, good old fashioned humour and genuinely interesting anecdotes about his life. As someone who loves Billy Connelly anyway, it was a breeze to read and wholeheartedly a highly recommended “quick read”.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: 3.5 starsYou definitely need to have seen Billy on stage before reading this. I think you might struggle reading it cold, so to speak.There were funny moments in the book too, but the routines got a bit lost in translation - he defo needs to be up there striding about talking, acting, describing and doing all the noises! 😅

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I've always found Billy Connolly funny even when I was a student in Glasgow in the 70s. Lots of the material in the book was familiar to me but in a good smiley remembering way. A lighthearted book good for a chuckle in the long dark Scottish evenings. :)). Thanks for all the laughs over the decades Billy. You followed your calling and we are all the better for it.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Excellent to read some of the Big Yin's stand-up routines, and what makes it even more hilarious is you can't read the lines without hearing his voice. Rated "4/5" on Goodreads as some of his material is much better when listening to him actually perform them rather than in reading them in this book. Nonetheless, an enjoyable read. 4/5.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Billy has been part of my life from an early age and love everything he says and does.Alot of the stories I laughed again at, after remembering him saying them in standup routines.Enjoyed the ones I hadn't heard before.A book to treasure and the last 'story'' is one we should follow.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: An easy reading Xmas present. I like Billy Connolly, he has always made me laugh. This was a collection of anecdotes and ponderings from the big man, some obviously funnier than others, all written exactly as he would say them, so it reads like one of his stand up routines. Very sweary.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Billy is an absolute icon and national treasure! I’m prepared to fight anyone who says otherwise!This was such a wonderful collection of his tales and made me laugh out loud on multiple occasions. Definitely a 5 star read and would recommend to anyone who loves a giggle!

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Great for fans as this is a transcription of a wide selection of his stand up. Does lose a little from bit being supplemented by Billy's voice and enthusiasm,although you can't help but read it in his accent.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: A very enjoyable read! It is a collection of stories from his stage act over the years peppered with anecdotes on life, delivered in Billy's inimitable style! If you like Billy you will know many of these stories but they lose nothing in the retelling!

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Although this was a bit of a slow read for me due to other commitments.I laughed at this book even during dark moments of the last few months, got lost and imagined myself there and laughing along as all these stories took place before me.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: If you’ve seen most of Billy’s shows, you won’t need to read this book. Hearing and seeing him tell the tales and anecdotes is a much more pleasurable experience than reading them. Having said that, one or two did make me laugh out loud, even though I’d heard them before.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: My God, what a book. I've always lived Billy Connolly, he's a national treasure of my homeland. I've seen all his shows on first VHS, then CD. What can I say about him that hasn't already been said. I laughed myself silly all the way through this book, and all I could hear was his voice in my head. I haven't enjoyed a book this much in ages.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Warm and affectionate (in spite of / because of the swearing!) there is no new ground here and some old wee stories, but they're told well and so you can't help smiling and thinking of the Big Yin, as he slowly grows older and quieter

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I remember many of these tales and enjoyed hearing them again. However, I don't know how much the book adds, if anything. I think I would sooner revisit the videos of stageshows as the humour is so very visual. Just the sight of the man is enough to make you laugh!

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Enjoyed this immensely, having been a fan for years some of the tales come from various stage shows but still very funny. The balaclava tale had me holding my sides. A must read for any Billy Connolly fan

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I did laugh out loud in sone parts but overall I found it a bit lacking. Maybe more ‘autobiographical’ information may have made it feel more complete.I guess Billy Connolly is mostly about the performance & not just the stories.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Billy Connolly is, in my eyes, the greatest comedien to have to have been born and this compiles some of his best stories. Part biography and part getting his comical legacy on paper this is a must read. Expect stories that are not politically correct, a lot of swearing, sadness and laughs.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Exceptionally funny in parts. But doesn’t always work because a lot of his stand up was about his delivery, body language and audience interaction. So as a book I was a little disappointed. But still enjoyed it.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: One of the funniest books I've ever read. So many laugh out loud moments. Have seen Billy several times and great to read some of those stories he tells. The only book I've ever read in a Scottish (Billy) accent. Go treat yourself, you won't regret it.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: A collection of the Big Yin's stories, anecdotes and jokes that you can't help but read in his voice. You've probably heard them all before, but they are worth listening to again. Pull up a chair and have a pint, whilst Billy entertains you.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I was given this book as Christmas reading. As usual, I found Billy's wit and vulgarity shine through in his inimitable style. The book is a bit of a meander, just like his stand up shows. Worth a read.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I always thought Connolly's delivery was 90% of his act and here you get to test that theory. The material is drawn from his years of stand up and apart from The Crucifiction which I got lost in, it stands up well. He is a hard man not to like.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Stray stories, bits of stage business, reminiscences and bits of stream of consciousness including childhood, the evils of Toblerone, the mystery that is potatoes of the night and reasons to go to a clarinet tutor.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: For those familiar with Billy, this is what you'd expect; having seen him on stage twice, I enjoyed this collection of anecdotes and could imagine his voice relating them.Some of them fall a bit flat on the page, but there are some rip-snorters that had me laughing out loud.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Brilliant as everThis book covers material from various shows over the years and Billy continues to create brilliant humour from normal everyday events. Brilliant as ever. A genius.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: There are some parts which simply cracked me up! So just for that it was worth the read. I guess its better if you can appreciate Billy charachter before you start to read this book. A nice message at the, that i'll remember till i die :)

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I always love everything he writes or has been written about him.Such an easy read and lots of laugh out loud moments. Makes it easy knowing his voice in my head so it was like he was talking to me.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I like Billy Connolly. He is fun and a funny guy, I think. Having said that, once more I made the mistake of reading stand up comedy. It's making me laugh out loud when watching it performed but written down...nah. Not nearly as funny as performed.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Really disappointing. There are a few funny anecdotes early in the book that I remember from his tv shows, but after that it deteriorates into drivel. His material is much better performed live rather than written down.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Too funny. I can just see him on stage and hear him saying the words. I love him and his way of telling stories. Wish I could tell stories like that. He's a master. His observations of life is amazing. No wonder Pamela married him. Such an interesting character.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Turns out he writes well, is there anything he can’t do?Lots of hilarious anecdotes I wish I could remember but I laughed out loud several times while reading.If you’re a fan of his comedy style you’ll love this!

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: My Dad had a similar upbringing to Billy and I remember him uncharacteristically crying with laughter at his records. This book is full of stories I have already heard and some I hadn’t. I liked the ones I had heard him tell the best as I could more easily imagine Billy’s voice telling them.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Great RecordI so appreciate having this record of some very funny sessions. Bringing back great memories of a wonderful story teller. Strongly recommend if you like Billy style of humour.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Virtually all stories make you smile. I have seen Billy Connolly a few times & to hear the stories told by him causes crying with laughter so I tried reading the stories in a Scottish accent still does not get close to the real thing. If you have seen many comedians you may notice some of his stories have been plagiarised by some. New wave copying the master

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: F%£&ing brilliantFabulous book, brilliant stories you can hear his voice telling them as you read it. If ever you invite him to a salad buffet beware and please invite me! I laughed out loud all the way through and fervently hope he writes another

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I loved this book, short chapters that you can pick up and put down at will. You can't help but read them in the Big Yin's inimitable voice. I bought this for my husband at Christmas but I enjoyed reading it too. Pick it up and read a chapter if you need a pick me up.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Billy ConnellyIf you like Billy you'll love this stories repeated from his shows just what you need during a pandemic good laugh out loud slugs Only Billy can make the c word funny

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: If you.need something to cheer you up during this dreadful time, then read this book. It’s not often I laugh out loud reading a book. Lots of anecdotes true or false it doesn’t really matter. Many you may have seen him perform if you seen him on TV or live, but he is still one of the funniest.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Excellent - like being at a showFamiliar stories old and new, can hear his voice reading the book and that's not on Audible, still find his stories funny after all these years. A true all round entertainer.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: O haven't laughed like that in years, very refreshing, its so nice to read of someone with a grasshopper mind ilke my own. I aways believed I was weird, now I know that is not a bad thing to be. Thanks

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: A fantastic story teller on stage and even though not every joke works as well written down like this they are still wonderful stories. And it is such a shame he won’t be performing them onstage again.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Billy's greatest hitsQuite simply, this is a collection of The Big Yin's best loved anecdotes and comedy routines. There's nothing here that a regular viewer or listener of his stuff won't have heard before, but I defy anyone to read it without laughing. Loudly.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Not many books make me laugh out loud, but this one did. Once you get into the rhythm of Scottish phonetics, this book is an easy, funny weekend read. I found myself reading whole chapters to my husband to make him smile.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Parts were really funny and I laughed out loud. Unfortunately I had heard him actually tell a number of the stories so they were not a surprise. Written in wee short sections so ideal reading on a train or bus or something. Recommended.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: This book is really just some of his routines written down word for word. So if you're a Billy Connolly fan you'll have heard all this already and don't need to spend your money on it. Slightly disappointing.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: God of the Comedy worldThis man is a genius. I loved this book. I have watched and listened over the years to Billy, and can honestly say I have never cried so much with laughter. Well done Billy for putting it on paper

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: This collection of observations by Billy Connolly is just what was needed in the seriousness going on right now. A great bit of humour and escapism. As the stories were generally quite short, I could dip in and out when I had time rather than have to remember what had gone before!

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Honestly a must own book, the best of Billy's stand up all in one book.I laughed so much and I can see me re reading this in the future and if you have any interest in the comedian Billy then this is the book for you. I'm so glad this book was finally released.😊

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: The only reason I went for three stars rather than 4/5 is that I had heard most of the anecdotes before delivered in various stand up routines- perhaps, unfairly, I had hoped for more things that I hadn’t. I still enjoyed reading reading it, and you can very much hear Billy’s voice in every word.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Great recap on some of best storiesSome of his greatest stories ever told on stage in here and made me laugh throughout. I could almost hear him telling them to me in his own inimitable style. Easy to read on the go as it’s broken down into wee stories.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I loved this. I laughed so much I was in tears and pain, I’ve never laughed so much at a book. I could hear his voice as I revisited his stories. A real pick me up book at such a difficult time in our lives. Everyone should read this. Billy is a true legend of Scotland.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: I love Billy Connolly, I think he is a great comedian and I love his work in the film and music industry but this book did not do it for me. Some of it was funny, gathering a small chuckle from me, but when the book totals 320 pages, I was highly disappointed and I found myself skimming the book.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: FantasticI laughed so much at this book,and I needed it. I have just lost my husband and I don't mean I can't find him,he died,and this book made it easier for me, believe it or not. Billy has a knack and I hope he writes many more.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: A funny book that reads just like Billy talks which I enjoyed on surface level. It’s full of mini anecdotes some I recognised from previous stand up and it was funny. However some of the views and thoughts are outdated and don’t show billy in the best light. Nevertheless a good wee read

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: A wee taleA very entertaining read as if Billy was on stage. A great account of his youth and early adult good but covering lots of topics we will all face with good grace and humour.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Load of codswallop waste of time and money not funny in any way definitely not recommendedOnly read first few pages. Definitely don't recommend this book, a load of filth and codswallop, a waste of time and money

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Excellent bunch of storiesJust a great laugh of tales and memories from a hilarious story teller.Makes me want to go to Scotland during a pandemic!Thank you Billy for all the laughs and the last 50 years worth!Cheers, here's to many more laughs.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: It's Billy Connolly. His voice, his jokes and tales. His voice echoes in your mind as you read each story. Some are fucking funny. Some are fucking not. Some are past their sell by date. If you like Billy, you'll like the book. Nothing more to be said.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: A good laughI loved this book, it was just like watching him on stage, what he says is really funny, but so true, I loved this book and am sure I’ll read it again, just be careful where you read it ad it’s a really laugh out loud read

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: A real laugh out loud collection of...Tall tales and wre stories funnily enough.Only reason I rate it a 3 is I was already familiar with alot of the material in it from his stand up, records, and TV Programmes.But honestly its the big yin an he just makes ye laugh

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Laugh out loud as you read , as you would expect from the great BC

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Absolutely fantastic! Billy is so raw, real and hilarious. I read most of this on my commute to and from work. I'm not gonna lie, I snorted so many times on the train! He's an icon.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: At last..... Billy finally has some insights to his funniest jokes - Billy has never written his material in the past so this is a welcome edition which coincided with a film release.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Billy's stories are best listened to rather than read I think. However, Ibiza still had me in tears!

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Billy Connolly is an absolute genius. Hilarious from start to finish. I’ve been lucky enough to see him live too. 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Loved this have always enjoyed watching Billy Connelly on tv but this book made you feel he was in the room with you telling a story

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: As a fan of Billy Connolly I really enjoyed this book.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: If you want to read a stand up special with some heart then read this beauty.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Loved tis book as it reminded me of all his routines that I have seen or heard over the years. Most of the material was stuff I had already heard, but it ws great to read it and laugh!

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Laughed out loud many times although I think you have to have seen Billy to fully appreciate it. Lots of happy memories wrapped up in this book.

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
text: Amazingly funny and well written you can hear his voice as you read and i do love him... such a good read to cheer you up and remember his stand up days .

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly

book_title: Tall Tales and Wee Stories: The Best of Billy Connolly
